channel.title: [317] Divine-Chaos Development Team! [317] Recruiting Members!
channel.description:
[u][size=14pt]NOTE[/size][/u]
[b]I HAVE DROPPED THIS PROJECT FOR RUNE-WARFARE SO PLEASE DO NOT BUMP THIS![/b]
[b][/b]
[u][size=14pt]Intro[/size][/u]
[b]Divine-Chaos is a server I have been working on for quite some time now; and I think that is about time I had a team help me finish the server. With a team, the server progress would move much faster[/b]
[b][/b]
[u][size=14pt]Needs[/size][/u]
What I need are people who are VERY active, and as dedicated as I am to the server. I need very trustworthy people because trust is a very important thing. I don't want to have to anti-leech or jar anything.
Who I need:
Testers: Easiest job, but you have to be the most active out of everyone. Basically whenever im on, I'll be testing new stuff out on you, might be weapons, or you may be testing out new minigames etc. This is what I would consider and fun and easy job, which requires only private server experience to be recruited to this position.
Hoster: I NEED a Hoster, really bad. A need a hoster with a very good computer, and who knows how to portforward, and host a server properly. I will give more info once I choose the hoster.
Graphic designers: Self-explanitory but I need people to help me with graphics (banners, logo's, client backgrounds... etc.)
Testers 3/3 (Runespace, Markku, ScaredHeart) Hoster 0/1 (Runespace maybe) Graphic Designer 1/1 (Runespace)
^^ The people above will be the staff, and the hoster will be Owner; Not co-owner, but an owner with me. Equal powers, both make decisions together. Compromising.
[u][size=14pt]What The Server Is Like[/size][/u]
It's a mix of Pking and Skilling the pictures you are going to see might look like there is PVP in draynor, it's not in real draynor, it's in a private map from draynor.
See the pictures:
NOTE: I USE 1-HIT RING IN SOME OF THESE PICTURES!!! So don't spam my topic with "omgez yo y u hit so high? dis is bulshet !!!"
NOTE2: I used these picture in my server divine-chaos... for some reason my topics got deleted but whatever.
100% Godwars bosses animated
[IMG]http://i1203.photobucket.com/albums/bb392/DivineChaosImages/GWD-Zamorak.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i1203.photobucket.com/albums/bb392/DivineChaosImages/GWD-Saradomin.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i1203.photobucket.com/albums/bb392/DivineChaosImages/GWD-Bandos.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i1203.photobucket.com/albums/bb392/DivineChaosImages/GWD-Armadyl.gif[/img]
Private Map From Draynor
[IMG]http://i1203.photobucket.com/albums/bb392/DivineChaosImages/PVP-system4.jpg[/img]
Specials
[IMG]http://i891.photobucket.com/albums/ac113/zezimo52/For%20runelocus/SGS-spec-1.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i891.photobucket.com/albums/ac113/zezimo52/For%20runelocus/ZGS-spec-1.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i891.photobucket.com/albums/ac113/zezimo52/For%20runelocus/DLONG-spec.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i891.photobucket.com/albums/ac113/zezimo52/For%20runelocus/DDS-spec-1.gif[/img] Dragon Claws does have 4 hits, but if the npc/player has low hp, it will only show one hit. [IMG]http://i891.photobucket.com/albums/ac113/zezimo52/For%20runelocus/DCLAW-spec.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i891.photobucket.com/albums/ac113/zezimo52/For%20runelocus/DBOW-spec.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i891.photobucket.com/albums/ac113/zezimo52/For%20runelocus/BGS-spec-1.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i891.photobucket.com/albums/ac113/zezimo52/For%20runelocus/AGS-spec-1.gif[/img]
And lots more I could not show.
[u][size=14pt]Contact me[/size][/u]
At tehclawzfury@hotmail.com & via moparscape pming system. Once I get to trust a few people, they may text me aswell. But I'm not going to release my number to a forum full of java masters and hackers :D
Layout should be like this:
Name (feel free to use your server name lol): Age: Hotmail: What you are applying for (Tester, Hoster, Graphic designer): Proof of experience: Why do you want to join the Divine-Chaos Community:

item.title: [317] Divine-Chaos Development Team! [317] Recruiting Members!
item.dc:creator: @lukeashworth lukeashworth
item.description:
@lukeashworth wrote:

Name: Luke Ashworth, Had a few servers such as Arrival-Scapev2 And Lukescape.
Age: 16 Nearlly 17
Hotmail:Luke_josh_ashworth@hotmail.co.uk
What you are applying for (Tester, Hoster, Graphic designer,Forum Maker, Coder, Tbh everything server and forum sided.):
Proof of experience: Hmm my proof of forum making would be my forum,http://arrival-scape.4rumer.com/.
Also My servers which are not up atm because its alot of effot running one myself, thats why ive switched to helping people.
Why do you want to join the Divine-Chaos Community:Hmmm as i said in the last question, i like to help people.

I think ive said ennuf, if you wish you can pick one of these 12 year old kids who think they can code because they did ::npc 1 and now think they are amazing, or you can pick me and we will see what we can help you with

Read full topic
